players.name: Alice
memory: Charlie: "I am the detective. I investigated Alice last night and she is the mafioso. We should all vote for her."

Diana: "Charlie claims to be the detective and says he investigated Alice, finding her to be the mafia. I'm a villager, so I don't have any special abilities to confirm or deny this. Bob is dead, and it's unclear how that happened...."
You: "I don't believe Charlie. He's probably the mafioso trying to frame me after Bob's death. We should vote for him instead."
Diana: "I don't have any special abilities, so I can't confirm Charlie's claim about Alice. Bob's death is concerning, and I'm unsure who to trust. We need more information before we vote."
